text.value: DAREEMI: qanjaruufo maqaarka: Labo farood maqaarka ee caloosha. Ma ku noqo:

IMCI | RASMI cudurka HIV
• Billow daaweynta ART iyo daryeel HIV • Sii prophylaxis cotrimoxazole • Qiimee quudinta ilmaha iyo bixiyaan la-talin ku habboon in hooyada • Talo sii hooyada daryeelka guriga • Asess ama tixraac qiimaynta TB iyo INH therapy ka hortag ah • Si joogto ah dabagal sida tilmaamaha qaranka
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:
Dhiig kar sare/ Ama dhiigkarka xiliga uurka
Misanka o loo eegayo dhererka wiilasha jira 0-2 sano
Xaqiiji in bukaanku caqabad caafimaad darro heeyso
Waxuu ucabayaa sidii wax ooman camal asagoo boobaya
EEG IYO DHAGEYSO: Hubi haddii ay jiraan:
Taariikhdee ayaa laga qaaday saxardii ugu horraysay

IMCI | HIV bandhigi
• Sii prophylaxis cotrimoxazole • Ku bilow ama sii prophylaxis ARV sida ay ku taliyeen • Ma baaritaanka fayruska si loo xaqiijiyo xaalada HIV • Qiimee quudinta ilmaha iyo bixiyaan la-talin ku habboon in hooyada • Talo sii hooyada daryeelka guriga • Si joogto ah dabagal sida tilmaamaha qaranka
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:

IMCI | Dhego-xanuun
• Sii antibiotic ah muddo 5 maalmood ah • Sii paracetamol xanuunka • Ku qalaji dhegta by wicking • Raac-up in 5 maalmood
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:
Bacteriyada miyaa sabab u ah cudurka
Raad raac hagaha latacaalida caruurta yaryar

Wasaaradda Caafimaadka/ Xogta Bukaanka
Cunuggu wa kayaryahay 2 bilood lamana galin karo buugga
Fadlan siiwad aragtida haddii usan shaqayneen sistemka
Misanka o loo eegayo dhererka gabdhaha jira 0-2 sano

IMCI | OGOW DEGDEG: CUDURKA aad u daran
Ilmo qaba wax calaamad guud ee halista u baahan yahay fiiro DEGDEG; buuxi qiimeynta iyo daaweynta kasta oo pre-gudbinta si degdeg ah sidaa darteed aan la gudbin dib.
• Sii diazepam haddii hadda gilgilay • Si dhakhso ah u buuxi qiimeynta • Sii daweyn kasta oo pre-referal Dawee si looga hortago in sonkorta dhiigga ee hooseeya • Ka dhig ilmaha diiran • DEGDEG U dir
Xaqiiji haddii mid kamid ah kuwaan uu leeyahay bukaanku
Bukaanka oo ka yimid meel kale
Cudurka ku dhaca qanjirada thyroidka, Dheecaan aad u yar soo daaya
Gariir qalal ahaan ah ayaa iqabta ama haduu hayaaba.

IMCI | dabadhiig
• Sii ciprofloxacin 3 maalmood • Raac-up ee 3 maalmood
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:

IMCI | FUUQBAXA NO
• Sii dareere, zinc supplements, iyo cuntada si loogu daweeyo shubanka guriga (Plan A) • Talo sii hooyada marka ay si degdeg ah ku soo laabto • Raac-up in 5 maalmood haddii aadan hagaajinta
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:
Taariikhaha la soo dhaafay oo keliya loo oggol yahay
Bukaanku maqaatay IPT booqashadii 1aad ee uurka intay kujirtay 3dii billod e hore

IMCI | MASTOIDITIS
• Sii qiyaasta koowaad ee antibiotic ku haboon • Sii qiyaasta koowaad ee paracetamol xanuunka • DEGDEG U dir isbitaalka
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:
Cudurka ku dhaca qanjirada thyroidka, dheecaan aad u badan soo daaya

IMCI | HIV CUDUR badna
• Daweeyo, talada iyo daba-jira cudurada
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:
WEYDII: Ma ilmaha dhigta HIV daryeesho?

Wasaaradda Caafimaadka/ Warbixinta dhimashada
Qofka dhintay ma haween uur leh bay ahayd?
IMCI | MAARAYNTA isku dhafan ee CUDURADA CARUURTA
WEYDII: Miyuu hooyada ama ilmaha baaritaanka HIV?
Waydii: Hooyadu manuujisay cunugga naaska o kaliya

IMCI | CUDURKA xummadda aad u daran
• Sii qiyaasta koowaad ee antibiotic ku haboon • Daawee ilmaha si looga hortago in sonkorta dhiigga ee hooseeya • Sii hal dose of paracetamol ee xarunta caafimaad u qandho sare (38.5 oC ama wixii ka sareeya) • DEGDEG U dir isbitaalka
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:

IMCI | NO Jeermis dhegta
• Daaweynta No
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:
Misanka o loo eegayo dhererka gabdhaha jira 0-2 sano

IMCI | NO nafaqa-darro xun
• Haddii ilmuhu ka yar yahay 2 sano jir ah, qiimeyn quudinta iyo talada hooyada ilmaha on quudinta sida ay talooyin quudinta • Haddii dhibaato quudinta, daba-in 7 maalmood
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:

IMCI | Anaemia
• Sii birta • Sii Mebendazole haddii ilmuhu waa 1 sano ama ka weyn oo aan lahaa qiyaas in 6 bilood ee hore • Talo sii hooyada marka ay si degdeg ah ku soo laabto • Raac-up in 14 maalmood
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:

Wasaaradda Caafimaadka/ Warbixinta dhimashada
Dooro waxa sababay geerida
Cudur Xira sambada oo mudo dheer socda

IMCI | Anaemia DARAN
• DEGDEG U dir isbitaalka
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:
WEYDII: Waa maxay xaaladda fayruska ilmaha?
WEYDII: Miyuu ilmuhu lahaa jadeecada 3 bilood ee ugu dambeeyey?
Hal iyo kabadan Waad dooran kartaa

IMCI | JADEECADA
• Sii Vitamin A daaweynta
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:
EEG IYO DHAGEYSO: Hubi haddii ilmuhu:
Fiiri: Miyuu ilmuhu ayaa indhaha godan?

IMCI | JADEECADA adag DARAN
• Sii Vitamin A daaweynta • Sii qiyaasta koowaad ee antibiotic ku haboon • Haddii aleelka ee wilka ama malax dheecaan ka isha, codsan cadar isha tetracycline • DEGDEG U dir isbitaalka
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:
Xaqiiji haddii mid kamid ah kuwaan uu leeyahay bukaanku

IMCI | OOF WAREEN DARAN AMA JIRRO AAD U DARAN
• Sii qiyaasta koowaad ee antibiotic ku haboon • DEGDEG U dir isbitaalka
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:
Hal iyo kabadan Waad dooran kartaa

IMCI | fuuq bax daran
• Haddii ilmahaagu leeyahay ma soocidda kale daran: • Sii dareere waayo, fuuq-bax daran (Plan C)
AMA
• Haddii ilmahaagu uu sidoo kale leeyahay soocidda kale daran: • DEGDEG U dir isbitaalka hooyada la siiyo kabashooyin noqnoqda ee ORS oo ay jidka ku tali hooyada in ay sii wadaan naasnuujinta • Haddii ilmuhu uu yahay 2 sano jir ama ka weyn oo uu jiro daacuunka meesha aad degan tahay, ku siiyo antibiotic daacuun
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:

Wasaaradda Caafimaadka/ Xogta Bukaanka
Wakhtiga Booqashada

Wasaaradda Caafimaadka/ Warbixinta dhimashada
Dooro waxa sababay geerida

IMCI | Jeermis dhegta RAGAADIGA
• Ku qalaji dhegta by wicking • ula quinolone mariyo eardrops muddo 14 maalmood ah • Raac-up in 5 maalmood
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:
Bukaanku maqaabkale buu ku helay mara kaneecada
Wax Caddaad ah ma jirran calaacalaha
Taariikhdee ayaa saxaradi labaad laga qaaday
Bukaanku mahelay maro kaneeco xiligi laqaybinayay
Cudurka oo si dhaqsa ah ukordha
Fadlan qor da'da saxda ah ee sano
Feeraha hoostooda of gudaha u laabta

MCI | Shuban baxayn
• Talo sii hooyada on quudinta ilmaha booqdey ayaa Shuban Baxayn • Sii la ogaaday iyo macdanta (oo ay ku jiraan zinc) muddo 14 maalmood ah • Raac-up in 5 maalmood
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:
Waydii: Nocee waaye caanaha lasiiyo ilmaha

IMCI | JADEECADA indhaha ama afka CILLADAHA
• Sii Vitamin A daaweynta • Haddii dheecaan ka malax ka isha, daaweeyo cudurka ku dhaca indhaha marisay isha tetracycline • Haddii boogaha afka, ku daawee gentian violet • Raac-up ee 3 maalmood
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:
Waxaa haya xasilooni darri iyo xanaaq

IMCI | FEVER
• Sii hal dose of paracetamol ee xarunta caafimaad u qandho sare (38.5 oC ama wixii ka sareeya) • Sii daawada antibiotic habboon wax sabab bakteeriyada qandho aqoonsaday • Talo sii hooyada marka ay si degdeg ah ku soo laabto • Raac-up in 2 maalmood hadii ay qandhadu sii • Haddii xummad joogo maalin kasta muddo ka badan 7 maalmood, tixraac qiimaynta
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:
Fiiri: Ma jiraa bararka oo labada cagoodna?
GELI: Miisaanka u sarrayso ama Weight mudada z-score
Waad dooran kartaa in kabadan midh
Cudurka kilyaha oo mudo dheer socda

Wasaaradda caafimaadka/ Cuduradda
Dooro Waxa uu ka cabanayo bukaanka
Dhawaq laga maqlo sambabka qof qaba Qaarjeex

IMCI | pneumonia
• Sii Amoxicillin afka muddo 5 maalmood ah • Haddii xiiq (ama la waayay ka dib markii si degdeg ah ku simaha nogotid) siin ah neefsado nogotid muddo 5 maalmood ah • Haddii indrawing xabadka ee HIV bandhigi ilmaha / cudurka, siiyo qiyaasta koowaad ee amoxycillin iyo tixraac. • dejiyo cunaha iyo nafiso qufac la xal nabad ah • Haddii qufaca ka badan 14 maalmood ama hinraagid soo noqnoqda, u gudbin, waayo, TB ama qiimeynta neefta • Hooyada tali markii ay si degdeg ah ku soo laabto Raac-up ee 3 maalmood • DEGDEG U dir isbitaalka
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:

booqdey | Socoshada CAAFIMAADKA DADWEYNAHA
Diiwaangelinta Dhimashada:
Misanka o loo eegayo dhererka wiilasha jira 2-5 sano
Hal iyo kabadan Waad dooran kartaa
Haddii natiijada baaritaanka uu yahay mid diidmo this waa ma noqon karto duumada! Fadlan mar kale hubi!
WEYDII: ilmuhu ma leeyahay dhibaato dhego lagu?
Bukaanka malaga wacyigaliye xanuunka HIV iyo baritaankisa
Waad dooran kartaa in kabadan midh
Xaqiiji inuu bukaanku leeyahay mid kamida tilmaamayaasha khatarta s
Waydii: Hooyadu masiisaa cunuga caanaha qasacada
Xaxiiji inuu bukaanku qabo mid kamid ah jirra lamaanahaan:
Misanka o loo eegayo dhererka gabdhaha jira 2-5 sano
Booga badan ee afka kazoo baxa
WEYDII: Miyuu qandho la joogo maalin kasta?
Ilmaha waxaa lasiiye kaliya naaska oo wax cunta kale ah lama siinin

IMCI | DHEXDHEXAAD AH nafaqa-darro halis
• Qiimee quudinta iyo talada hooyada ilmaha talooyinka quudinta • Haddii quudinta dhibaato, dabagal in 7 maalmood • Qiimee infekshanka TB suurto gal. • Talo sii hooyada marka ay si degdeg ah ku soo laabto • Raac-up in 30 maalmood
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:
Hal iyo kabadan Waad dooran kartaa

Wasaaradda Caafimaadka/ Warbixinta dhimashada
Dimashada mawaxaa xaqiisay hay'adda caafimaadka?
Hal iyo kabadan Waad dooran kartaa
Maxaa bukaanka loogu daweyn waayay ACT
Misanka o loo eegayo dhererka wiilasha jira 2-5 sano
Waad dooran kartaa in kabadan midh
WEYDII: Waa maxay xaaladda fuliyo ilmaha?
Taariikhda uu bukaanku isku arkay caalamadaha
Miyuu qufacaa leeyahay sanka oo dareeraya ama indhaha oo casaada
Misanka o loo eegayo dhererka gabdhaha jira 2-4 sano
Hal iyo kabadan Waad dooran kartaa
Hal iyo kabadan Waad dooran kartaa
Hal iyo kabadan Waad dooran kartaa
Waydii: Daawada aad qorayso mawaxad kasinaysaa IEHK

IMCI | fuuq
• Sii dareere, zinc supplements, oo cunto u fuuq qaar ka mid ah (Plan B) • Haddii ilmahaagu uu sidoo kale leeyahay soocidda daran: • DEGDEG U dir isbitaalka hooyada la siiyo kabashooyin noqnoqda ee ORS oo ay jidka ku • Kula tali hooyada in ay sii wadaan naasnuujinta • Talo sii hooyada marka ay si degdeg ah ku soo laabto • Raac-up in 5 maalmood haddii aadan hagaajinta
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:
42 malmood kaddib markeey hooyada bila dhamaystay
DHAGEYSO: Tiri neefsasho ee hal daqiiq
Taariikh ahaan mise kuleel baa hayo mise heerka kuleelka oo gaarey 37.50 C mise kabadan
Egyihiin ayna dareemayaan, ilmuhu ma leeyahay:
aan awoodin in uu wax cabbo ama naaska nuugo/Jaqo

IMCI | Anaemia NO
• Haddii ilmuhu ka yar yahay 2 sano jir ah, qiimeyn quudinta iyo talada hooyada ilmaha sida ay talooyin quudinta • Haddii dhibaato quudinta, daba-5 maalmood
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:

IMCI | Qufacdo ama QABOW
• Haddii xiiq (ama la waayay ka dib markii si degdeg ah ku simaha nogotid) siin ah neefsado nogotid muddo 5 maalmood ah • dejiyo cunaha iyo nafiso qufac la xal nabad ah • Haddii qufaca ka badan 14 maalmood ama hinraagid soo noqnoqda, u gudbin, waayo, TB ama qiimeynta neefta • Hooyada tali markii ay si degdeg ah ku soo laabto Raac-up in 5 maalmood haddii aadan hagaajinta
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:
WEYDII: ilmuhu ma leeyahay qufac ama neefsiga oo ku adag?

Wasaaradda caafimaadka/ Cuduradda
Dooro Waxa uu ka cabanayo bukaanka
misanka o loo eegayo dhererka wiilasha jira 2-5 sano
Taarikhdee ayuu isku arkay awood darrada addimada mise balaysnimada

IMCI | Shuban joogto ah DARAN
• Daawee fuuq hor gudbin haddii ilmuhu leeyahay soocidda kale daran • U dir isbitaalka
Ma ku raacsan tahay ogaanshaha this ?:
EEG IYO DAREEMI: Hubi haddii ilmuhu:
Child waa in ay noqdaan wax ka yar 59 bilood (5 sano)
ma awoodo in uu wax cabbo ama waxuu cabaa in yar
Bukaanku maqaatay IPT booqashadii 1aad ee uurka
Haddii natiijada baaritaanka uu yahay mid diidmo this waa ma noqon karto duumada! Fadlan mar kale hubi!
Ka dooro cudurka adoo fiirinaya liiska cudurada muhiimka ah
Xaqiiji inuu bukaanku leeyahay mid kamida calaamadahan
FEEL: Skin pinch: Pinch the skin of the abdomen. Does it go back:
ASK: Does the child have diarrhoea?

IMCI | CONFIRMED HIV INFECTION
• Initiate ART treatment and HIV care • Give cotrimoxazole prophylaxis • Assess the child’s feeding and provide appropriate counselling to the mother • Advise the mother on home care • Asess or refer for TB assessment and INH preventive therapy • Follow-up regularly as per national guidelines
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:
Check if the patient has any complications:
LOOK AND LISTEN: Check if there is:
Date of first stool sample collection

IMCI | HIV EXPOSED
• Give cotrimoxazole prophylaxis • Start or continue ARV prophylaxis as recommended • Do virological test to confirm HIV status • Assess the child’s feeding and provide appropriate counselling to the mother • Advise the mother on home care • Follow-up regularly as per national guidelines
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:
ASK: Has the child ever been vaccinated?

IMCI | ACUTE EAR INFECTION
• Give an antibiotic for 5 days • Give paracetamol for pain • Dry the ear by wicking • Follow-up in 5 days
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:
Has any bacterial cause of infection

MOH | INFORMATION NOTE
The baby is less than two months and is too young to be entered into this record.
Please continue the consultation without the system.

IMCI | URGENT ATTENTION: VERY SEVERE DISEASE
A child with any general danger sign needs URGENT attention; complete the assessment and any pre-referral treatment immediately so referral is not delayed.
• Give diazepam if convulsing now • Quickly complete the assessment • Give any pre-referal treatment immediately Treat to prevent low blood sugar • Keep the child warm • Refer URGENTLY
Check if any of the following apply to this patient:
At what time did the death take place?

IMCI | DYSENTERY
• Give ciprofloxacin for 3 days • Follow-up in 3 days
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:

IMCI | NO DEHYDRATION
• Give fluid, zinc supplements, and food to treat diarrhoea at home (Plan A) • Advise mother when to return immediately • Follow-up in 5 days if not improving
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:
Did the patient receive IPT during ANC1 within the first trimester?

IMCI | MASTOIDITIS
• Give first dose of an appropriate antibiotic • Give first dose of paracetamol for pain • Refer URGENTLY to hospital
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:

IMCI | HIV INFECTION UNLIKELY
• Treat, counsel and follow-up existing infections
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:
ASK: What is the status of the mother?
What is the HIV status of the patient?
ASK: Is the child enrolled in HIV care?

MOH | MORTALITY REPORT
Is the death a pregnant woman?

MOH | PATIENT INFORMATION
Age of the child (in months):

IMCI | INTEGRATED MANAGEMENT OF CHILDHOOD ILLNESS
ASK AND LOOK: Is the child:
ASK: Has the mother or child had an HIV test?
ASK: Does the mother exclusively breastfeed the child?

IMCI | VERY SEVERE FEBRILE DISEASE
• Give first dose of an appropriate antibiotic • Treat the child to prevent low blood sugar • Give one dose of paracetamol in clinic for high fever (38.5 oC or above) • Refer URGENTLY to hospital
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:

IMCI | NO EAR INFECTION
• No treatment
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:

IMCI | NO ACUTE MALNUTRITION
• If child is less than 2 years old, assess the child's feeding and counsel the mother on feeding according to the feeding recommendations • If feeding problem, follow-up in 7 days
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:

IMCI | ANAEMIA
• Give iron • Give mebendazole if child is 1 year or older and has not had a dose in the previous 6 months • Advise mother when to return immediately • Follow-up in 14 days
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:

MOH | MORTALITY REPORT
Select the cause of death:

IMCI | SEVERE ANAEMIA
• Refer URGENTLY to hopsital
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:
ASK: What is the virological status of the child?
Where was the place of death?
ASK: Has the child had measles within the last 3 months?
ASK: Does the mother breastfeed the child?
ASK: What vaccinations has the child received?
More than one choice can be selected.

IMCI | MEASLES
• Give Vitamin A treatment
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:
LOOK AND LISTEN: Check if the child:
LOOK: Does the child have sunken eyes?

IMCI | SEVERE COMPLICATED MEASLES
• Give Vitamin A treatment • Give first dose of an appropriate antibiotic • If clouding of the cornea or pus draining from the eye, apply tetracycline eye ointment • Refer URGENTLY to hospital
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:
Is the patient treated with ACT?
Check if any of the following apply to this patient:

IMCI | SEVERE PNEUMONIA OR VERY SEVERE DISEASE
• Give first dose of an appropriate antibiotic • Refer URGENTLY to hospital
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:
A change in the presentation of a disease
Does not want to inform HIV status
More than one choice can be selected.

IMCI | SEVERE DEHYDRATION
• If child has no other severe classification: • Give fluid for severe dehydration (Plan C)
OR
• If child also has another severe classification: • Refer URGENTLY to hospital with mother giving frequent sips of ORS on the way Advise the mother to continue breastfeeding • If child is 2 years or older and there is cholera in your area, give antibiotic for cholera
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:

MOH | MORTALITY REPORT
Select the cause of death:

IMCI | CHRONIC EAR INFECTION
• Dry the ear by wicking • Treat with topical quinolone eardrops for 14 days • Follow-up in 5 days
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:
Did the patient receive a LLIN by other means?
Date of second stool sample collection
Did the patient receive a LLIN during routine distribution?
Please enter correct age in years

IMCI | PERSISTENT DIARRHOEA
• Advise the mother on feeding a child MOH has PERSISTENT DIARRHOEA • Give multivitamins and minerals (including zinc) for 14 days • Follow-up in 5 days
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:
ASK: What type of formula is the baby using?

IMCI | UNCOMPLICATED SEVERE ACUTE MALNUTRITION
• Give oral antibiotics for 5 days • Give ready-to-use therapeutic food for a child aged 6 months or more • Counsel the mother on how to feed the child. • Assess for possible TB infection • Advise mother when to return immediately • Follow up in 7 days
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:

IMCI | MEASLES WITH EYE OR MOUTH COMPLICATIONS
• Give Vitamin A treatment • If pus draining from the eye, treat eye infection with tetracycline eye ointment • If mouth ulcers, treat with gentian violet • Follow-up in 3 days
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:

IMCI | FEVER
• Give one dose of paracetamol in clinic for high fever (38.5 oC or above) • Give appropriate antibiotic treatment for any identified bacterial cause of fever • Advise mother when to return immediately • Follow-up in 2 days if fever persists • If fever is present every day for more than 7 days, refer for assessment
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:
LOOK: Is there oedema in both feet?
ENTER: Weight for height or Weight for length z-score
More than one choice can be selected.
Cause of death at time of delivery:

MOH | COMMUNICABLE
Select the presenting complaint:

IMCI | PNEUMONIA
• Give oral Amoxicillin for 5 days • If wheezing (or disappeared after rapidly acting bronchodilator) give an inhaled bronchodilator for 5 days • If chest indrawing in HIV exposed/infected child, give first dose of amoxicillin and refer. • Soothe the throat and relieve the cough with a safe remedy • If coughing for more than 14 days or recurrent wheeze, refer for possible TB or asthma assessment • Advise mother when to return immediately Follow-up in 3 days • Refer URGENTLY to hospital
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:

MOH | PUBLIC HEALTH SURVEILANCE
Would you like to register:
Cause of death 42 days after term / birth:
ASK: Are you prescribing medicine today?
More than one choice can be selected.
If the test result is negative this is cannot be malaria! Please check again!
ASK: Does the child have an ear problem?
Did the patient receive HIV counselling and testing?
More than one choice can be selected.

ASK: Is the mother providing an infant formula?
Check if the patient has any of the following co-morbidities:
ASK: Has fever been present every day?
Child is fed with breast milk only without any other food or water

IMCI | MODERATE SEVERE ACUTE MALNUTRITION
• Assess the child's feeding and counsel the mother on the feeding recommendations • If feeding problem, follow up in 7 days • Assess for possible TB infection. • Advise mother when to return immediately • Follow-up in 30 days
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:
More than one choice can be selected.
Has the patient been previously vaccinated?

MOH | MORTALITY REPORT
Is the death notified by a Community Health Agent?
ASK: Is there blood in the stool?
More than one choice can be selected.
Why is the patient not treated with ACT?
ASK: Does the child have fever?
More than one choice can be selected.
ASK: What is the serological status of the child?
Has cough, runny nose or red eyes
More than one choice can be selected.
More than one choice can be selected.
More than one choice can be selected.
ASK: Are you prescribing from the IEHK?

IMCI | SOME DEHYDRATION
• Give fluid, zinc supplements, and food for some dehydration (Plan B) • If child also has a severe classification: • Refer URGENTLY to hospital with mother giving frequent sips of ORS on the way • Advise the mother to continue breastfeeding • Advise mother when to return immediately • Follow-up in 5 days if not improving
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:
LISTEN: Count the breaths in one minute
by history or feels hot or temperature 37.5 oC or above
LOOK AND FEEL: Does the child have:

IMCI | NO ANAEMIA
• If child is less than 2 years old, assess the child's feeding and counsel the mother according to the feeding recommendations • If feeding problem, follow-up in 5 days
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:

IMCI | COUGH OR COLD
• If wheezing (or disappeared after rapidly acting bronchodilator) give an inhaled bronchodilator for 5 days • Soothe the throat and relieve the cough with a safe remedy • If coughing for more than 14 days or recurrent wheezing, refer for possible TB or asthma assessment • Advise mother when to return immediately Follow-up in 5 days if not improving
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:
ASK: Does the child have cough or difficult breathing?

MOH | COMMUNICABLE
Select the presenting complaint:

IMCI | COMPLICATED SEVERE ACUTE MALNUTRITION
• Give first dose appropriate antibiotic • Treat the child to prevent low blood sugar • Keep the child warm • Refer URGENTLY to hospital
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:

IMCI | SEVERE PERSISTENT DIARRHOEA
• Treat dehydration before referral unless the child has another severe classification • Refer to hospital
Do you agree with this diagnosis?:

is not able to drink or drinking poorly

bind.calculate: if(( /somalia_case/diarrhoea_signs = "restless" and /somalia_case/diarrhoea_eyes = "yes") or ( /somalia_case/diarrhoea_signs = "restless" and /somalia_case/diarrhoea_drinking = "eagerly") or ( /somalia_case/diarrhoea_signs = "restless" and /somalia_case/diarrhoea_skinpinch = "slowly") or ( /somalia_case/diarrhoea_eyes = "yes" and /somalia_case/diarrhoea_drinking = "eagerly") or ( /somalia_case/diarrhoea_eyes = "yes" and /somalia_case/diarrhoea_skinpinch = "slowly") or ( /somalia_case/diarrhoea_drinking = "eagerly" and /somalia_case/diarrhoea_skinpinch = "slowly"), 1, 0)

if(( /somalia_case/diarrhoea_signs = "lethargic" and /somalia_case/diarrhoea_eyes = "yes") or ( /somalia_case/diarrhoea_signs = "lethargic" and /somalia_case/diarrhoea_drinking = "poorly") or ( /somalia_case/diarrhoea_signs = "lethargic" and /somalia_case/diarrhoea_skinpinch = "vslowly") or ( /somalia_case/diarrhoea_eyes = "yes" and /somalia_case/diarrhoea_drinking = "poorly") or ( /somalia_case/diarrhoea_eyes = "yes" and /somalia_case/diarrhoea_skinpinch = "vslowly") or ( /somalia_case/diarrhoea_drinking = "poorly" and /somalia_case/diarrhoea_skinpinch = "vslowly"), 1, 0)

if( /somalia_case/imci_diarrhoea_severedehydration ="yes" or /somalia_case/imci_diarrhoea_somedehydration ="yes" or /somalia_case/imci_diarrhoea_nodehydration ="yes" or /somalia_case/imci_diarrhoea_severepersistent ="yes" or /somalia_case/imci_diarrhoea_persistent ="yes" or /somalia_case/imci_diarrhoea_dysentery ="yes","no","yes")

if( /somalia_case/danger_urgent =1 or /somalia_case/cough_severe = 1 or /somalia_case/diarrhoea_severedehydration =1 or /somalia_case/fever_severe = 1 or /somalia_case/ear_mastoiditis = 1 or selected( /somalia_case/cough_signs ,"indrawing"),1,0)

if( /somalia_case/hiv_confirmed = 0 and /somalia_case/hiv ="no" and not(selected( /somalia_case/hiv_statusmother ,"positive")) or /somalia_case/hiv_confirmed = 0 and /somalia_case/hiv ="no" and not(selected( /somalia_case/hiv_serological ,"negative")),1,0)
